title: American Sniper
content:
Looking for the serif and san serif....i think they're beautiful together. Thanks.

[http://cdn.collider.com/wp-content/uploads/american-sniper-poster.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302132720/http:/cdn.collider.com/wp-content/uploads/american-sniper-poster.jpg "http://cdn.collider.com/wp-content/uploads/american-sniper-poster.jpg")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [american-sniper-poster.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302132720/http:/typophile.com/files/american-sniper-poster.jpg) | 1020.6 KB |
author: jivasoul

comments.content: Without too much thinking I'd say [Trajan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302132720/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/trajan) for the serif and [Akzidenz Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302132720/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/akzidenz+grotesk) for the sans.
